QuestionTxt: To the best of your knowledge, would you say the (2010) health reform law does or does not provide financial help to low and moderate income Americans who don't get insurance through their jobs to help them purchase coverage?
StudyNote: 751 respondents were interviewed on a landline telephone, and 752 were interviewed on a cell phone, including 411 who had no landline telephone.
